definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: If Shou Shen, vertical pro at nothing, only superficial ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 若不守身，縱能事親，亦只是皮毛儀式而已。

sentences.english: Two newspapers did avery effective hatchet job on the Prime Minister's achievements.
sentences.chinese: 有兩家報紙對首相的成就極盡詆譭之能事。

sentences.english: The hen boasts what she has done.
sentences.chinese: 母雞下蛋後卻展盡吹噓之能事。

sentences.english: He defamed his ex-wife by every possible means.
sentences.chinese: 他對他前妻竭盡誹謗之能事。

sentences.english: There she collects the force of female lungs, sighs sobs and passions.
sentences.chinese: 她極盡女性之能事，長呼短嘆，泣不成聲，悲憤不已。

definition: to praise sb to his face
florid but insubstantial remarks/misleading way of saying sth
equally true for (all the rest)/the same thing applies (for everyone)
to curry favor/to advance one's career by toadying
compasses, set square, spirit level and plumbline (idiom); fig. established standard/norms/criteria
that being the case/then/in that case
none doesn't/there is none who isn't/everyone
